original_text: If he comes alone, he is to go free alone; but if he has a wife when he comes, she is to go with him.
korean_text: 만일 그가 단신으로 왔으면 단신으로 나갈 것이요 장가 들었으면 그의 아내도 그와 함께 나가려니와

sentences.original_text: he is to go free alone
but if he has a wife when he comes
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 그가 올 때 아내가 있다면
